alert.note: Alert for Lincoln County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 11 at 9:47AM PDT until April 12 at 3:00AM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM PDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts 45 to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Esmeralda and Central Nye County, Lincoln County, Northeast Clark County and Sheep Range. * WHEN...Until to 3 AM PDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Winds this strong can make driving difficult...especially for motorcycles and high profile vehicles and create areas of blowing dust or sand...resulting in briefly lowered visibilities to well under a mile at times.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
